text: Acunakyase, nami mät ja namimät mcei ua, Pamhnam20:28: Pamhnam; cangcim avang üngtaBawipa. naw a cakpa20:28: A Cakpaa thi üngkhyüh; am ani ünga Cakpa thihnak üngkhyüh; amäta thi üngkhyüh. thisen am a khyäiha sangcim nami mcah khaia Ngmüimkhya Ngcim naw aning jah mceisaka tome cän pi jah mcei ua.
